original_title: Ludovico Einaudi - Live In Verona: In A Time Lapse Tour
overview: Ludovico Einaudi performed his latest album ‘In a Time Lapse’ at the 11,000 capacity Arena di Verona in July 2014. Einaudi is accompanied on stage by 11 musicians comprising of strings, electric bass, guitar and percussion.  The result is an 11-track, 61 minute extravaganza.  The release of this comes a day after a sold-out 5,000 seat open-air concert at Blenheim  Palace, where the same set will be played. This concert takes place on 28th June. 2014
title: Ludovico Einaudi - Live In Verona: In A Time Lapse Tour
